title: Nicky Morgan – 2016 Speech at Holocaust Education Trust Lecture
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Nicky Morgan, the Secretary of State for Education, on 12 January 2016.

[![nickymorgan](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/nickymorgan.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/nickymorgan.jpg)
